name: HowManyDays
0:
”Alexa, open how many days”
”Alexa, start how many days”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: how many days
des: Open the skill and Alexa will automatically tell you how many days remain until all your next self care activity. Alexa can also remind you about the exact date for a specific events. This skill was created using a Skill Blueprint. Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
priv: Your requests to this skill are not shared with the skill developer.
